name: Encode Sans_85% (iOS10-12)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
85% size. Install 'Encode Sans' for normal character size.

Only compatible on iOS10-12. iOS13 users please install the package marked “iOS13”.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Apply with Anemone. Package name = Fonts.

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
